list:
Note for conventions of standard titles: - Standard titles are given as found in the respective published catalogues; priority is given to D, Ui 1934; then Q, Suzuki 1962, then S, Skorupski 1985. The Tibetan is given according to EWTS. No capitalization of titles. - Hyphenation is an issue; generally, hyphens are reproduced as found in the published catalogues; only in cases of hyphens that serve a mere graphic these are not reproduced. If hyphens were added to separate words, then these are reproduced, also the many hyphens found in Q. - Sanskrit anusvara is rendered with a dot below m, as found in Q, not with dot above m, as found in D.

bstod tshogs khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod paD viśeṣa-stavaD Praise of Exaltation84000 Udbhaṭasiddhisvāmin khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa khyad par du 'phags par bstod pa viśeṣa-stava ilanggui-a kedürgei maqtagal
2
bstod tshogs khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad paD viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkāD Extensive Commentary on [Udbhaṭasiddhisvāmin's] “Praise of Exaltation”84000 Prajñāvarman khyad par du 'phags pa'i bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa viśeṣastava-nāma-ṭīkā ilanggui-a kedürgei maqtagal-un aqui yeke nomlal
3

4
bstod tshogs lha las phul du byung bar bstod paD devātiśayastotraD Praise of the One Who Supersedes the Gods84000 Śaṅkarasvāmin lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa lha las phul byung devātiśayastotra tngri-dece kedürgei bolugsan-u maqtagal
5

bstod tshogs sangs rgyas kyi bstod paD buddhastotraD Praise of the Buddha84000 Vasudhārā sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba buddhastotra-nāma burqan-u maqtagal kemegdekü
7
bstod tshogs chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod paQ dharmakāyāśrayāsāmānyaguṇastotraQ Praise of the Uncommon Good Qualities Abiding in the Dharmakāya84000
chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan la bstod pa dharmakāyāśrayāsāmānyaguṇastotra nom-un bey-e-dür orosigsan yerünggei busu erdem-ün maqtagal orosiba
